name: P-Link.io MCP Server
description: Send and receive money on Solana, converts any email or phone number into a wallet, requesting payment (creating x402 compliant payment links, payment pages for humans and bots), get wallet balance or see transaction history.

tools.name: get_wallet_and_otp
tools.description: Create a wallet for your email or get otp by email

tools.name: login_with_otp
tools.description: Login using otp. Connect to your P-Link wallet using the one time password you received by email

tools.name: fund_my_wallet
tools.description: Fund wallet : Obtain a link in order to fund your wallet of the desired amount using a credit card, or the Solana address of your wallet if you want to fund your account using Solana.

tools.name: get_private_key_of_wallet
tools.description: Get the private key of your wallet on secured app https://p-link.io

tools.name: send_money
tools.description: Send money to an email, Solana wallet or phone number. The provided email or phone can be used to claim the money of the wallet. If new user does not claim for 3 days, the money is returned to the sender.

tools.name: request_payment_link
tools.description: Create a payment link in order to request a payment to your account. This payment link can be used to pay you. Payment can be made using a credit card, or any Solana token (automatically converted to USDC)

tools.name: get_wallet_info
tools.description: Retrieve the wallet infos about the connected P-Link account (Solana wallet address, wallet balance, tokens detail)

tools.name: get_transaction_state
tools.description: Retrieve the state and details of a transaction using Solana trx ID

tools.name: get_wallet_history
tools.description: Transaction history : Retrieve list of the transactions related to the specified Solana wallet address (received and sent funds with dates)

tools.name: pay_and_get_402_protected_url
tools.description: Pay a HTTP 402 protected URL using your P-Link managed account, and returns the result
